formula: a(n) = (2n-1) mod 6, for n > 0. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Apr 23 2014
maple: a:= n-> `if`(n=0, 0, irem(2*n-1, 6)): seq(a(n), n=0..99); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Nov 30 2006
mathematica: Table[Mod[2 n - 1, 6] - 5 Floor[1/(n+1)], {n, 0, 100}] (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Apr 23 2014 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 11 1996
